overview: "What elements have to align for a six second shot?"  Is It Happening? is a film displaying the modern snowboarders' lifestyle of chasing and creating unique shots in the streets and backcountry in the Rocky Mountains.
tagline: "What elements have to align for a six second shot?" Is It Happening? is a film displaying the modern snowboarders' lifestyle of chasing and creating unique shots in the streets and backcountry in the Rocky Mountains.
title: Is It Happening?
